Title: Multiple Cross-Site Scripting vulnerabilities in TYPO3 backend
Description: Failing to properly encode user input, several backend components are susceptible to Cross-Site Scripting, allowing authenticated editors to inject arbitrary HTML or JavaScript.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.16, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.6.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.16 before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.6.1
